reviews_data.review_text: I always been a normal guest when I had the financial I love coming here with my best friend a lot, she's the reason I know this place new cats their personalities this best place to be at their tea is wonderful. Thank you for always making a place I can be happy at. This helps my autism so much.
I absolutely loved this place. The staff was so wonderful and pleasant. The coffee was amazing and all the kitties omg loved them all couldn't get enough!!
absolutely loved hanging with all the kitties and drinking goood local coffee.

I made a reservation to celebrate my birthday in a special way. I was running a few minutes late since there was traffic and we were driving all the way from SC. I called and informed them. They said they'd make it work. When we arrived the employees were not very warm or welcoming. The total opposite actually. It almost felt like we were visiting inmates at a prison with their demeanor. Didn't offer a drink, had to ask about ordering a coffee. The whole time we were in there they were just watching us intensely as we played with the cats. It was very overbearing to say the least. They then asked us to leave and didn't care to honor my whole hour. It was not special at all. Was very disappointed.
Amazing experience!!! Wonderful staff! Of course the cats were beautiful
never disappoints. $12 for 1 hour. adopt a kitty!
Always a good time with friendly folks and adorable cats üñ§

Absolutely go visit this place if you like cats and coffee. Although they do serve beer and wine as well. It was like $8 to hang out with a room full of kittens and they were all eager to play. Plus you can adopt them as well!
Place is rad, man. Great coffee and tea, beer, wine, etc.....AND CATS! LOTS OF CATS!

The Cat Cafe is a amazing place to enjoy cats and meet others who like cats. You get plenty of time with the cats and most are super friendly. I don't like the prices though. The prices are way too high and it's just ridiculous to pay that much!!!

Very beautiful space, but the workers ignored us and favored certain customers over my daughter and me. They even carried two cats over to sit on certain customers' laps. We left early despite paying for an hour due to this. The downtown location has friendlier cats and better customer service I hear, avoid this location.

Took my sister for her birthday, I did not even know this place was in Charlotte. I do recommend this for any cat lover or anyone actually. Cats are very friendly and playful. 10/10! Parking in the very front is limited, there is more parking right behind it and across the street.
Such a cool place! Coffee is great, snacks are great (they have gluten free options- thanks Kayla!)- and of course, the cats are great. We had such a good time. Best date night ever ‚ù§Ô∏è
Such a great place! A good-sized menu with small trinkets like magnets, earrings, and coffee - not to mention the friendly kitties you can play with! I had a great time!
We had wonderful experience! Fantastic and friendly staff, beautiful space, and all around good energy!
Realizing you can pet cats, or just sit with them, in a comfortable environment is quite a treat. Check the site ahead of time to see which cats are available to adopt. Have a hot tea. Chill. Cheers!
So cute i love the cats

Stellar spot in all aspects! The staff is very friendly and helpful, and of course the cats are a delight.  I also deeply appreciate how thoroughly the website addresses any questions someone might have on their first visit! Made my experience absolutely stress-free.

What a wonderful place! We made a reservation about a month in advance when we knew we'd be visiting close to Mac Tabby. The cat room is large enough that even though there were 10 people in there, it didn't seem crowded at all. We were free to move around and visit with several of the kittens; some were sleeping, some were active and playful. I was pretty excited that we could bring toys for them as well - as soon as we got there one of them practically jumped into my bag to get the catnip mice out :) Though we didn't get anything at the cafe', I like that there was a pretty big assortment and that you could bring your selection into the cat room with you (or they'd bring it in to you if you were already there). Knowing that a small fee goes to help so many of these wonderful cats, I'd be visiting there weekly if I lived in the area. I will absolutely make another stop in the next time I'm in the area.

Loved this place- I didn't do the full five stars only because it was my first time being here and there were a lot of unsupervised kids present. I know this isn't strictly the cafes fault but I witness some children being super aggressive with the cats until they almost attacked. (Ex- shoving toys in their face, putting hands and fingers in their face when they're clearly annoyed, shoving toys in the employee only room where the litter boxes are, etc.) My only suggestion is allowing slots for people that are 18+ only, just to give older people time to unwind and interact/meet with the cats without kids present. Regardless awesome and friendly staff and great selection of drinks and cute kitties!
Such an amazing place üòç
Amazing! Staff was lovely and the cats are all so friendly. Will definitely be back.
Love this place. Staff are wonderful and cats are adorable.
Two hours with these cute cats! The people are so friendly. I love the location too.
Stop in and try an iced PSL!  Simply the best I've ever had!  And for a mere $8 you can enjoy it while snuggling a feline friend üòä

SUCH A FRESH IDEAüôÄüòª This is Cat Lovers Paradise! I brought my husband here while visiting Charlotte in a secret date and he was happy as a kid:) Even tho, I'm more a dogs person, i have to say that life with cats is a game changerüòπ I took lot of pictures!
Very cute and fun experience. Katy was the employee who helped us and she was so kind and amazing :)
Such a great experience! The staff was so friendly the coffee was yummy and the cats - well they were perfect!

Mac Tabby Cat Cafe is ran by an extraordinary team, doing incredible things. They just passed their 1000'th adoption to date, that's 1000 happy cats that otherwise might not have had a forever home. If you happen to get lucky enough to run into Lori, she can make a mean latte to top it all off! Thanks for everything y'all do Mac Tabby!

The Mac Tabby Cat Cafe in Concord is such a neat place! We booked the cat room for an hour and the cats were so sweet and the room was awesome; lots of cat toys to interact with the cats and very clean, smelled amazing! The employees were so helpful and pleasant, and they serve a nice variety of beer as well as coffee, tea and smoothies and other treats. I can't wait to go back!
Awesome coffee Cute vibe

Such a great experience! The space is very clean and welcoming. And the kitties are just the sweetest! We didn't try anything from the cafe this visit but we definitely will next time. I highly recommend making a trip.
Delicious, fast and friendly!!

The hosts were very chill and friendly. The room was clean and smelled really fresh. The cats were sweet and it was just very calming to sit in there for an hour and be with the cats. It was even better because we got to pay with a Groupon, so we got a nice discount. Would definitely go again to relax.
Loved playing with the cats!!! Officer was my favorite!!

Very clean and well maintained areas. Loved the spacious room where we interacted with the cats. They are well cared for and happy. Glad that so many were already adopted and just waiting for final pickup.
Coffee was very good and enjoyed the cats that were awake. Lots a sleepy kitties at the time we arrived.
One of my favorite places!
Great coffee and lots of cats, all up for adoption. Be prepared to wait for a time slot to pet the cats. Very friendly owner and excellent location!!
Most magical place in Charlotte. In addition to a dozen well mannered cats they have the best baristas. They have coffee and tea, beer and wine and more. Put this place at the top of your list.
Such a great place to visit

Fun place to go and play with cats. The staff is lovely. When my cat loving friends come to town they really enjoy visiting. I love the idea of being able to meet cats in a relaxed environment if you're considering adopting. Go and have fun!
We had a very relaxing time with the cats. The cafe was very clean and the cats were friendly and happy. Delicious iced coffee and cookies. Will plan another trip soon!
Had a meet up with friends. Very relaxed atmosphere. Great coffee! The cats were well behaved. Had a charming experience.
Great experience.
Best cats ever! They have a wide selection of drinks, coffee, beer, wine, etc. If you want the cats to be more active go in the morning. If you want them laying around go in the afternoon.

One of the BEST cat cafes in the nation, surrounded by a cool art district with tons of yummy food options as well!  Super friendly staff, an amazing art collection, excellent selection of craft beers and of course, snuggly kittens!!! üòª
Such a great place!! We booked a private hour and the kids, parents and grandparents all loved it!

Really disappointed by my most recent visit here. Ive been a few times and usually have a positive experience, but visited yesterday to make an appointment for a friend and I at 3:30, a couple hours out. About an hour before my appointment I ended up with a bad migraine that impacted my vision and felt sick, so I went to cancel my appointment and they informed me they don't do refunds. Seriously? I didn't even buy anything, just a space that they could easily fill as the place was packed. Not giving a refund doesn't make sense.

We visited today for a private lounge visit.  The staff were all friendly and wonderful, beautiful clean location, delicious drinks and some of the sweetest cats available for adoption.   We had an awesome time and will definitely return.
Is this home?

I had a very lovely experience. I decided to go there while on vacation. The cats were so sweet! The cafe had a very cute and aesthetic setup too! Sawyer and Robert were my favorite cats. The drink I got was also very tasty! They have cute merchandise as well!  If I am ever in the area again I will definitely go back!
As a cat lover, I must say.. this place is awesome! üòéüòéüòéüòé

The staff is very friendly and attentive. The facility is very clean, and there are plenty of toys to use to play with the cats.   The cats all have different personalities, some like to rest and some like to play and interact.  I have taken my grandsons here twice and they love it. You can make reservations online, which is very convenient.

We absolutely love visiting the Mac Tabby Cat Cafe. Playing with the kitties and cats is so much fun. The cafe is super clean, the cat room is really cool with lots of cats toys and cats lounging around. And, knowing they are helping to get so many cats into their fur ever home is awesome.  Also, lots of goodies available like drinks, snacks, and awesome t shirts for sale.
The girls and i love your cafe! We love your cats! So beautiful and sweet and fun! We will definitely be back and visiting the Concord location!
Coffee was excellent, the cats were adorable and they had plenty of toys around to play with them. Highly recommend for an hour of fun, relaxing time.
(Translated by Google) Very expensive  (Original) Muy costoso

Once of my favorite places to go when visiting NC. The cats are all so sweet and well taken care of. The ladies who run the place are wonderful and do a fantastic job. The drinks are seriously tasty and they have adorable accessories and trinkets. Kudos for making such a special place that has helped home over 800 cats!

(Translated by Google) Great Coffee! The staff is super welcoming, the cats are nice and so cute, we want to adopt them all üòÖ in any case very good experience, I would go back with pleasure!  (Original) Super Caf√© ! Le personnel est super accueillant, les chats sont gentils et trop mignons, on a envie de tous les adopter üòÖ en tout cas tr√®s bonne exp√©rience, j'y retournerais avec plaisir !
My son and his GF absolutely raved about this place...and they're sullen teenagers.
Very nice time and the hosts were knowledgeable, friendly, and fun. The cats are all unique and sweet in their own way. Very relaxing and eclectic environment. It's the cat's meow!

What better way to get a serotonin boost? We took my daughter to Mac Tabby today for her birthday and it was such a great experience, friendly staff and you can tell the kitties are very taken care of. And the beautiful atmosphere is just the icing on the cake. Can't wait for our next visit.

When taking a break from real estate.  I love spending time with my youngest, and her friends at the Mac Tabby Cafe. We love coming here not only for the cute kitty's, but they have delicious coffee. The staff is great! I have been to this location 3 times this year so far.

Support this business at all costs! The Cafe is amazing, super clean and trendy. Their mission to find cats a home is beautiful. And they definitely find homes for the cats! I think she said they found homes for an astonishing 846 cats last year! These cats loved to be played with and loved on. The environment they are in is Club Med for cats. We didn't try the coffee, because we JUST finished a coffee before we found this place, but I encourage you all to support them with purchases of food and kitty cat time. Thousands of cats will thank you with their lives... literally!!! Oh, and they let you play the guitar while you wait your turn to play with the kittehs! üòÅ
It's so cute coffee was delicious
Very friendly women! Unfortunately i didn't have time to play with the cats but the Dirty Chai was the best coffee beverage i have ever tasted!!!
Yum! Love the blackberry white mocha! Such a cute little spot
Friendly staff, calm atmosphere
Love their coffee here. Such a cozy place to hangout.  Fyi: hard to find parking especially on weekend afternoon. I recommend going there during the week
Going here has always been such an amazing experience! Parking? Amazing. Staff? Amazing. Coffee? Amazing. Love bringing people here for a new experience.
The coffee taste horrible but the cats were cool
Cats are so cute
Clean, inviting, and the cats seem very well taken care of! Staff is friendly, helpful and knowledgeable- i recommend doing the hour ticket

Mac Tabby is such a fun experience for cat lovers and worth every penny. Whether you're looking for a cat to adopt or just to play and get some cat therapy, it's so worth the visit. Did I mention they have a coffee and wine bar too? Their dirty chai tea latte is the bomb. The cats are the sweetest and are rescued from kill shelters. What's not to love?! Highly recommend.

I've been to this cat cafe three times in the past year or so; pro tip-if you want quiet, with more attention from the kitties, go during the work week, betwen 11 am and 2 pm....you'll get more quality time, and the cats will be more relaxed and willing to interact.  The staff are all friendly and knowledgeable, and it is a great place to de stress and get cat love.

Great place ‚Ä¶ something new and enjoyable‚Ä¶ great place to just enjoy some alone time ‚Ä¶ I would definitely encourage others to come and try this place out ‚Ä¶ ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

The lady that was here serving us was so sweet, and very knowledgeable about the different cats that were in the room. I believe that were 10 or so cats that came in and out of the room, and they were all so sweet and playful! There were a couple of cats that were so playful, and a few that were really relaxed, so there were cats for all kinds of people's wants and needs for their 'cat therapy'.

It was cute and I loved the cafe options, my only issue is that it's basically impossible to just show up as an unknowing customer and have time with the cats since you need a reservation.  After the owners response, I realize my judgement was wrong.  I'm all for the profits for the kitties.  Update: I was able to finally go to for a reservation with the kitties! I was excited, but sad to find all of them were wiped from hours of play in the morning. Several kitties had URIs (Upper Respiratory Infection), which typically requires medicine and quarantine, so many of them were lethargic and sleepy and sick. I cleaned up some of their eye crusties, poor babies. I know it's just like the flu, so it's easily spreadable. I also disagree with the amount of people and time that were spent around the cats. The poor things need a break from so much interaction. Every 30 min to an hour, there about 8 people in the room at a time; maybe not always, but enough to exhaust these babies. I feel so bad for them.
(Translated by Google) I loved this place ...  (Original) Am√© este lugar...

Great location to hang out with cats and drink good coffee! The lounge is super cute, they have plenty of room to pet the chiller cats and toys to play with the more energetic ones. Will definitely be going back to get my fix since I can't have a cat in my apartment!
Love this place!  Get a cup of coffee, my favorite Blueberry Lavender Mocha.  YUM, then go pet the cats.  There is a charge for petting cats, but it is do relaxing.  And cats can be adopted.
the cats are so cute! the green hornet smoothie is really good
Cool staff. Cats cute AF. Winning.
Great coffe, great vibes, great staff, great time with cats! This place is awesome. If you like cats even just a little, check this place out totally worth it
Great service, immaculate coffee and the cutest kitties. 5 Stars Periodt
absolutely love this place! great atmosphere and cats galore!
Cats and cats and cats and cats. Plus cuddles with the cats.  (Oh also the staff were all really kind and helpful ~ but like cats)

I wouldn't say they are a Cafe. They offer a few hot drinks, and maybe a scone or similar. If you are looking for a full meal, this isn't the place. It is $8 to sit, and interact with cats for 30 minutes. You can't pick up the cats, (FYI), but if they sit in your lap that's okay.
Great spot for coffee and kitty petting.  Good concept for those who do not already own a condescending narsocist of their own.
The cats were very friendly and the dirty chia was amazing! I look forward to coming back

Fun experience with friendly, knowledgeable staff! The cats & kittens all LOVE the attention and enjoy playing with a variety of toys & balls! Great place to ADOPT any of the fabulous felines!üòöüò∏

WOW. This is a really special place. My daughter and her friend LOVED it! I've never seen any place like this! Coffee, hot cocoa, beer, kittens. And you can literally adopt the cats you're playing with! Unreal! Really and truly, this is the ultimate ‚Äúgood vibes‚Äù place. Unless you hate cats‚Ä¶üò¨
Absolutely loved the Mac tabby cat cafe in concord! It was so relaxing and fun! And the Cats ü•∞ü•∞ü•∞ you'll see all of their different personalities quick !
Best Cat cafe I have been too by far. Great area for the cats, amazing staff, and fantastic drink selection. Also a great place for studying or remote working!
Cute cats, perfect little place to relax
I love this place! We got a membership and go all the time. The employees are very friendly, the drinks are delicious, and the cat area is super cozy and relaxing.
The cats, the facility, and the staff are all awesome! <3

Amazing experience. Radius was an adorable and super cuddly kitty, he slept on me the whole time, and it was fun to watch the other cats be super playful. The cafe was also clean and well decorated, and the environment was overall very relaxing and enjoyable. I loved the lavender hot chocolate, and Katie was very friendly, accommodating, and nice to talk to. Will definitely be returning.

Awesome place and experience! They have great coffee, incredibly friendly and welcoming staff, warm atmosphere and of course the best part CATS. Had an absolute blast getting to hang out with some adorable fur babies and drink some yummy coffee. Fair warning the temptation to adopt them all is hard to resist! Can't wait to go back üòä
Lovely Cats, great drinks, wonderful atmosphere
Extremely friendly staff! The atmosphere is really chill, & the place is kept extremely clean! The cats are adorable & really friendly! It's a unique & great experience to be had! Highly suggested
Love this! Good coffee and a great experience! Pretty spacious room so you're not on top of other people. Staff was very friendly/sweet and helpful
An absolutely delicious and flavorful lavender latte and nice baristas. Calm and quiet, and could watch the kitties without going in.
This was a phenomenal place.  Love the atmosphere and the staffs dedication to these kitties.  Will be back for sure

Really clean, cute, and cozy on both the coffee shop and kitty sides. The cats were all sweet and playful and I love that they are up for adoption. My drink was also great. I had the iced butterbeer latte and it was delicious!

Had a great time here recently! Love the vibe. The place is fun, clean, and well setup. The owner and staff were extremely friendly and the place offers lots of beverage options. The cats are obviously awesome and well taken care of. Can't wait to go back the next time I'm in Charlotte!
üêà ‚ù§Ô∏è

We came to Mac Tabby's Cat Cafe in November 20th for my daughters birthday.  She absolutely loves cats.  We had a blast.  The staff were super friendly, the cats were fun to play with.  It was very clean.  Usually I sneeze around cats.  I had no problems at all. Thanks for our daughters 11th birthday memorableüòª
My sons LOVE coming here to hang with the cats. Such a cute space.
Great experience to chill for an hour with a great cup of their coffee and 12 or so cats to pet and play with. Daughter loved it.

This is seriously the best place ever.  Lori is super nice and you can tell she loves what she's doing.  We've been 3 times so far and adopted a kitty after our first visit.  We went again tonight and they had a delicious food truck on site and a fire going that we got to enjoy before our time with the kitties.
Such an amazing place! The coffee and drink selection is really impressive and the space where you can interact with the cats is perfect. Wide open, calm, and inviting. Definitely worth a look!
We loved playing with all the adorable kitties at Mac Tabby Cat Cafe! Prosecco on tap so the meow-mosas were flowing. We can't wait to come back for more time with our furry friends.
Great coffee, great staff, phenomenal cats!

I've been to dozens of cat cafes and this is by FAR the best cat cafe I've ever been to. The staff was amazing, super friendly and accommodating. The cats were very well taken care of and loved. 10/10 would recommend

My Mom and I took my daughter here for her 21st bday, she absolutely loved it. Smaller coffee area than I expected, but many different choices. Nice big play area with the cats. What a great idea. The vibe was neat.

Such a sweet spot! Great drinks and vibe, and the cats are soooo friendly and cute. I came to get some work done, which was a little tricky with cats on my keyboard, but there's space outside of the cat area where you can still soak up the vibe without distractions.
So fun and the people are so nice! Its a cat paradise. I recommend going earlier in the day because I went at 5pm and the cats were low energy. Still worth it!

Didn't get to spend long here, but we spent some time talking to one of the people there and they were very helpful and answered all of our questions. The store is beautiful and I love the aesthetic. It has a boho, industrial kinda feel and there is art everywhere. I would recommend it to anyone in the area, but make sure to book time online for the cat lounge.

Lots of fun, we really enjoyed ourselves. The cats are friendly and the staff is terrific. I will definitely be coming back. I recommend Mac Tabby Cat Cafe for a date. They have excellent coffee and a wide variety of beer selections. I hope this is enough words to get all those sweet sweet Google points.
Such an amazing place!
My son and I absolutely love this place!!!!!

My friend and I stopped by on a whim while visiting town. LOVED the cafe's clean, welcoming environment, and of course the real stars of the show - the precious cat friends. We didn't try any beverages but we could've stayed in the cat room all day long. It was really hard to not leave with a new furry family member‚Ä¶ we will be back!
The cats were so sweet and what a wonderful concept!

The best experience! Great prices at 8$ for 30 minutes of time with the kitties. I also enjoyed the match lavender lemonade. Make sure to reserve your spot early! If you like cats this is a required experience at least once! I also love they make sure to find homes for all the babies! All of the kitties were around 5-6 months. Also the only rule is you cannot pick them up.

Great little spot for coffee and to play with some kittens/cats ready to be adopted. Went for a date with my boyfriend and we felt so welcomed. Everyone was so friendly, and even went above and beyond to make my boyfriend a specific coffee. We enjoyed our time and will be back!

Thank you! A special thank you to all the kitties you made my year!!! The staff was so knowledgeable and caring. I enjoy the kitty time since my cats are seniors. I am hopeful they all get their forver homes! Xoxo

BEST PLACE EVER!!! I got their lemonade and it was great, but the cats were definitely the spotlight of this place! all the cats are up for adoption, and they have a huge playroom with multiple lounge areas where the cats will sit with you! decor is also beautiful in this space. cheapest form of therapy, for sure returning!!!

We loved our hour long visit, I could have stayed all day! It's so clean and welcoming and the staff was so nice and came in to tell us about the different cats. It was good to hear so many get adopted too, cause that's what's is all about.

We really enjoyed our time at Mac Tabby. They have great decor, friendly staff, a good list of beverages, and a great space for the cats.  The private hour with cats compared to the other cat cafe in Charlotte is more pricey, but Mac Tabby is open longer/more days and has a lot to offer in the heart of NoDa before and/or after the cat visit.  They have a large room for the visits. If you don't book for a private hour, they are currently letting in 12 people per hour. It looked pretty crowded for my comfort during covid. Most people were wearing masks but not all and since they have drinks, folks are taking them up and down. Pre Covid, they let in 15 people per hour.

I love Mac Tabby. They are super friendly here and the cat cafe experience is great. Every cat I interacted with was super friendly with a great personality. We even ended up adopting one of the cats that we really clicked with. He's been with us since Summer 2019 and he's really settled into the home life. The adoption process gave us no issues and it was great to get to know the cat first-hand.  The coffee here is also really good. Despite the many cats (which are kept separate from the cafe area), the whole area is spotless and exceptionally clean. I can't recommend this cafe enough to anyone who likes animals, good coffee, or both.  I didn't think to take any photos of the cafe, but I did include a picture of our adopted cat, Khoshekh (formerly known as Rustin).
Absolutely wonderful place! Nothing like snuggling a kitty to turn your day around ‚ù§Ô∏è
I loved hanging out with all the kitties and drinking my coffee. Such a fun place and a great way for these kitties to find their furever home

If you love cats and coffee this is absolutely the perfect place to go! The cats are so cute, they love to snuggle and play üòç. The coffee here is also great, I had an iced mocha latte and I've never had one as good anywhere else. Mac Tabby Cat Cafe is a great place to spend time with kitties and drink coffee. Loved it, and wish I could give more stars!
Fun place to hang out for an hour or two. Just make sure your not allergic to cats.
Love this place.. I cant have cats where im at and this place makes me happy

We went to the Concord  location today.  Fabulous vibe, fantastic service, amazing feline friends!  We had a great visit!  I highly recommend whether your looking to give someone their furever  home or just want to chill with the cats.
My boyfriend and I came here for a little date! The workers were so incredibly sweet and just made the experience even better!! Definitely recommend!

We had a wonderful time at the Mac Tabby Cat Cafe, and we enjoyed playing with cats and getting to know their unique personalities! It's such an uplifting place, great care for the cats and an awesome environment! Delicious lavender lemonade, too!

I would have to agree with others reviews.. if you just want to visit with some cats this is a great place! If you are looking to adopt, I would look elsewhere. The process is quite difficult, and I don't mean the screening.. adopters should always be screened. I mean more it was hard to get a straight response the entire time.
This place is not a restaurant and doesn't serve food. It's a place to pet cats. It's very relaxing.

Really nice place with super friendly and hospitable people! I enjoyed my visit very much and look forward to my next opportunity.  Coffee and the chocolate chip cookie sandwich were delicious too! üòã üòÉ

Excellent cafe with great staff, every time I go there I feel relaxed, and the coffee is always made perfectly. I haven't actually gone into the "Cat Room", but you can see in though glass and it always looks good in there.

A really quaint and fun cafe with a laid back vibe that offers coffee, craft beer and juices.The cafe supports a great cause to help in adoptions of felines to find forever homes.The cats roam freely in the kitty lounge that is separate from the cafe. For a small fee you can even have play time and interaction with the cats in their lounge. Its a great way to offer love and support to cats in need! Meow!
Fun staff, excellent coffees!
Fun place to visit! Best part was that every cat is up for adoption.
Fantastic people, great drinks, phenomenal kitties!
I like kitties, and I liked getting coffee at the Mac Tabby Cat Cafe.
Cute location if you want to go to a coffee shop or shop too. It was fun to see the cats and dream of them in our house.
Lovely time with the cats. Staff was very pleasant & welcoming. Recommend making reservation to go into cat room
This place was amazing the cats are really friendly the food was good the cats are also pretty playful so I got a few scratches but other then that this place is reallly good!

My old review was concerned about children being rough with the cats. This time? No one was playing rough at all and the staff circulated, had information about the individual cats and it was a much better experience. Maybe it was just too crowded last time?( probably! This time everyone was a cat lover too) My financial situation changed and I have now visited more cat cafes, now the price seems reasonable. They are adopting out so many cats and that's just wonderful to me!

It's impossible to be in a bad mood at Cat Cafe! We stayed for an hour and relaxed and played with some sweet and silly cats. The staff were very friendly and easy going. The drinks were delicious. While it is a bit pricey, there are often Groupons.

Wonderfully warm and eclectic cat cafe located up a flight of stairs on the second storey of a building in the NODA neighborhood of Charlotte, NC. Staff are super friendly and full of enthusiasm. The cats are located in a room separate from the cafe. Great cafe! Great merch! ADORABLE KITTIES!! A really nice place to visit and get some delicious snacks.
Cats and coffee, what's not to love?
If you love cats, please come check Mac Tabby out! It's very much worth the visit! I recommend Mac Tabby Cat Cafe

Highly recommend this place!! The staff are so nice and not pushy at all. Had coffee that's was really good and flavorful. The environment is nice and open with so many cats to hang with. I did the hour session and was really happy after I left!
We absolutely love this place! It's such a wonderful place to get some good coffee and pet some super sweet kitties!

CATS!!!! Wow, so much fun.  Went with a group and got some drinks to sip on and then just played with the various cats and kitties they have waiting to be adopted.  This is a must stop for anyone in town, give the pets some love and have a fun time. Yay for having a place like this around!

Such a great chill vibe, I love coming here to visit because I have two high prey drive dogs and feel it won't be best to have a kitten in the mix as well. All the kittens are adoptable and they are absolutely adorable
While I will say as a cane user it is hard to get up to, I readily enjoyed my stay.  Not only do they have a wonderful cafe the room where you sit with the cats was a perfect size for small parties.
Owner doesn't know how to run a business please seek retaining on how to care for cats!

The drinks were good and the cats were cute, but they let way too many people in the cat room at once and it felt uncomfortable a few crowded. It felt more like we were bothering the cats than anything else, and the cat to person ratio was off and made it a struggle to even get any time to be near a cat, let alone play with one. Half the people were pestering relaxing or sleeping cats.

Mac Tabby is such a cute spot to drink coffee, wine, study, while calmly falling in love with the cats and enjoying your time. It's in a nice little upstairs area too, so it's the perfect little cat nook. After the pandemic, I hope to get a membership!

This is a must for cat lovers! I added this stop last minute on my 4-day trip to Charlotte and it was by far my favorite experience in the city. The cat to human ratio made it possible to play and cuddle the whole time. Great coffee too! Can't wait to go back!
Very relaxing and welcoming atmosphere. It was interesting to learn that the cats they have at the cafe are available for adoption.
Love the decafe French Press, the staff and of course the CATS!!! Great area to walk around in Noda as well.
Loved this place, amazing employees, Jordan was awesome, the coffee, the decor, everything have 5 stars....even when I had to take a Claritin after leavingüòÖüòª

Excellent place! I love the vibes, drinks, and cats. I felt very comfortable the whole time (especially with the pandemic and guidelines). The staff is so friendly and helpful. The cats are just purrrrfect! I didn't want to leave!
Great Atmosphere and Friendly Staff really nice to see good people taking care of abandoned cats. They all looked so happy and healthy. Will be visiting the Concord location when its open.
Its soooo relaxing. The cats are so chill
Delightful staff and cute little cafe. Only serves small pastries for food, but has a good drink selection.

It's a cozy cafe with a mission! The staff had a rush of customers while I was there, but handled each order with grace and efficiency. Though no reservations are required to visit with the cats, they are encouraged on the weekends because of the influx of customers. I'll be back!
Fun place to hang out and enjoy cats. Only thing about this place is parking is somewhat confusing because the entrance is located on a main street.
Amazing place so calming and the staff was so nice plus you get to have a drink while petting cats whats better then that.
The lobby area has great drinks: smoothies, lattes, local craft beers.  And then you get to play with cats.

I visited the Mac Tabby Cat Cafe earlier today, sadly I came during the cat's naptime so it wasn't too active but it was still an AMAZING time! I came before around 2 years ago and remembered some but not the whole experience so I decided to come again for my birthday. I really adored one cat (Cooper) but sadly cannot adopt him right now, one day I plan to come with the chance of adopting but not today. I love all of the Cafe's furniture pieces and cat toys. The cats were all slouched on their towers and were s cute! The coffee was great too. The adoption rate is amazing, almost 474 as I recall. I recommend to and can't wait for my next visit!!!!
Amazing everytime i visit
A must visit place if you are in the area.

I booked an hour visit for my son's birthday.  I cannot say enough great things about the Cafe. The staff was amazing and helped my son with the cats.. We will definitely do this again. Thank you all so much.

Unfortunately wasn't able to partake in the cats and whatnot due to the popularity of the establishment, however, the coffee and green tea was still worth the visit.  Subtly looking over Noda and the general traffic, you can sit at the side bar and enjoy a solid coffee, tea, or brew with plenty of choices among their menu.  The staff was absolutely the definition of friendly even though they had to apologize due to their high booking and inability to accommodate us at that time.  You can still look through the windows and see the cats enjoying their lap of luxury and attention they're receiving from us commonfolk.  Would come by but make a reservation so I could play among the king's and queens of the Mac Tabby Realm
Everyone was sweet and the cats were little angels
Great customer service lots to do and love the cats
Amazing Service, Awesome kitty cats, and cannot wait to go back!
They had such sweet kitties and a fantastic drink selection. I will definitely be back when I want to adopt a cat myself.

This place is honestly so amazing! I love each time I come to see the cats! They're all so cute and up for adoption! I hope one day I can adopt one! The staff is friendly and pleasant and always so nice! I highly suggest it as a cute place to take friends or go on a date!
We always have a great time at Mac Tabby! Yummy drinks and snacks, plus cute kitties, best combo ever!
Awesome cafe & awesome cat area!!

very nice experience!! the cats were very friendly and well taken care of. the employee cared about the cats as well as the customers and was very kind. my honey oat latte was super good, too! highly recommend (they also sell cute earrings inside). we were taken into the cat lounge with a few other guests and were brought our drinks. after a while of getting settled in the employee gave us treats to give the cats and talked to us a bit about them (names, background, etc). if you're looking to adopt this is a great option, too. if you have mild allergies to cats, i wouldn't worry too much. bring allergy medicine just in case but they keep it SO clean I barely had a reaction. edit: forgot to mention we asked the manager for a nice local picnic spot and she was very responsive and nice. they definitely go the extra mile here :) another edit (so much to rave about), we drove about an hour and half to come here and i can honestly say it was completely worth it. even 4.9 stars is too low, should be 5.
Wonderful place to visit. Definitely family friendly. Scheduling our next visit with the furry friends asap.

Been here twice and love it. My sister and I enjoy playing with the cats for an hour every time we go and also enjoy the coffee they serve. We got to give the cats treats last time we went which was so much fun having a bunch of cats run to you for treats. Great place and great people

Always an awesome experience coming here! I had the membership for awhile and it's totally worth it! The coffee drinks are perfect, and the cats to play and snuggle with are even more perfect. The owner is involved, personable, hardworking and really fun to talk with, and the staff is always attentive and personable as well. Fantastic spot for both relaxing and entertainment.

Have been here twice and I love it. However only giving four stars because the most recent time I came, there was no real enforcement of covid safety. A handful of people that were together consistently had their masks worn as chin straps in addition to things simple as picking up the cats (which also is not allowed) Otherwise, great drinks and adorable cats for sure!

Great staff, lots of places for cats to chill. If they don't want to socialize there are places they can sleep without being disturbed. The woman in the room with us monitored everyone well. They also had a cute set up in the cafe and good drink options. Everyone working there was friendly. Their prices are great too. I was worried it would be expensive to pet the cats, but I was pleasantly surprised.
Best spot around to chill with cool cats and and awesome cafe drinks!

This was one of the most fun experiences ever! The staff was extremely friendly, and I had one of the best lattes I've ever had (seriously, order the honey oat latte). The kitties were all so sweet and I was surprised at how social they all were. I've grown up around cats and I can confidently say the cats in the cafe were all sweet and playful. I think this is such a wonderful idea and love that the cats are all finding forever homes. I will likely be coming back and recommend this to anyone in the Charlotte area :)
Mac Tabby was a great experience! I'm personally not a cat person, but still enjoyed my time at the cafe. The staff is super friendly and the cats are adorable!

Absolutely amazing. I went with my friend and we had a great time. The place was clean, the coffee was so good and the lady who was working was sweet! She really made us feel at home. She answered all of our questions! Hanging out with kitties is an absolute dream. Everyone should experience this and adopt your next kitty from here! We will definitely be back!

Absolutely loved this place!! First the lady working was so so sweet & friendly! Next the coffee= AMAZING, but most importantly- the cats were the most friendly, sweet & playful cats!!! The entire vibe & atmosphere was so so perfect!! I already booked admission to bring my daughter! Definitely recommended!
Such a wonderful experience! The staff is great and the play area is very clean and has everything the cats need & want. I would definitely recommend to anyone!
Good cause and you get to play & pet cats!

I never thought I'd go to a cat cafe. I'm allergic to cats and don't always love them, but we figured when in Rome...  The service was great. The drink selection was fantastic. And it's SO CLEAN.  I didn't even have an allergic reaction to the cats until after about 40 minutes, which is huge for me.  I was apprehensive but so glad we visited.
This place is awesome for the whole family.  Plus it's a great way to play with the cats before adopting them!!!
Went to Mac Tabby for the first time today (Thanksgiving) and it was wonderful! The staff was super friendly, the cats were adorable, and the drink options were great.

We reserved a time slot for 2 PM online.  The process was easy.  Before "cat time," we had many choices of drinks with a few snacks.  My daughter was delighted with the experience.  We will go back the next time we are in town.
Loved this place!  Great staff üò∏...... and the people working there were pretty good too üòÇ

This has become one of my favorite spots in Charlotte to hang out at. I did not get a chance to play with the cats (forgot to book a reservation), but the employees were super friendly!! I also enjoyed the beverages that were served to us. If you either live in or are visiting Charlotte and love cats, this place is worth checking out!  UPDATE: I came back for a second visit and also had an amazing experience. I finally booked a reservation to play with the cats and I had an OUTSTANDING experience.
What's not to love?
Adorable kitties and wonderful staff!

Honestly, do not miss this experience. The staff was phenomenal, the shop/lounge was so much fun, and the cat lounge area was clearly made to spoil the cats so perfectly. It was spacious and very well organized. The staff were knowledgeable about the adoption process and each cats personality and quirks! The cats are clearly living the life! Would recommend to anyone. I'm not even a cat person and loved it!

My kids love cats but I don't, so unfortunately we will never have one in our home. This was the perfect place to take them to get their cat fix for the day, while I was able to sit back and enjoy my coffee while they played. The facility is super clean with no cat smell or messes anywhere. They have a cute beverage/coffee/snack bar and the cafe part is separate from the cats, so you can get a nice treat and just watch the cats through the windows or enjoy the NoDa view. This place is a lifesaver for people like me who have kids that love cats and don't have one, all while supporting a wonderful cause and place of business.
great staff, great cats, great drinks, recommend for anyone, the sweet cats are also adoptable, what a great business!

Mac Tabby Cat Cafe was the most perfect hour of my trip to Charlotte. The staff is so incredibly friendly, helpful, informative, and willing to take photos of you and your boyfriend (how sweet!). The kitties are incredibly playful and loving, as well. There's absolutely no way to go wrong with a trip to Mac Tabby's, even if you're just coming around to admire the BEAUTIFUL space overlooking NODA. We will 1000% be back!
Excellent coffee and a great atmosphere. I didn't interact with the cats so I can't comment on that.
Great coffee and so much fun getting to play with all the sweet kitties.
Friendly staff, even friendlier kitties! They also make an amazing iced chai.
Amazing! The cats are well taken care of and the coffee is great.

If you're looking for an affordable and sweet experience in Charlotte, this is the spot. The coffee selection is delicious and they offer beers local to the area. Obviously, the kitties make the experience beyond worth it and if you're looking to adopt a new family member you can easily get more information from the amazingly sweet staff. This establishment is a must-try in Charlotte!

Mac Tabby was my first cat cafe experience and it was a great one! Super clean and fun to play with kittens for an hour. Such a great way to get them socialized and eventually adopted. Definitely a fun time!

Didn't get the chance today to actually go in with the cats but am coming back for sure. Owners were super friendly and personable. Gonna have to drag my butt outta there when I do finally come. So looking forward to it.

First time going and it couldn't have been more perfect. All the kitties were adorable, customer service was fantastic, drinks from the caf√© were great, and merch was lovely. I cant wait to go back. I recommend doing a reservation and signing the waiver beforehand. It made everything so easy.
I went here with my sister because we had some free time and I loved every part of I thought it was great I would say fair priced coffee and a good experience

Mac Tabby is amazing! I took my teenagers for our first visit today and can't wait to go back. The staff was so welcoming and friendly and our drinks were fantastic. Of course, being able to hang out with the kitties was our primary reason for being there and they made the trip worth it! I am so thankful that this great place allows these precious animals to have an opportunity to find their forever home.

Fell. In. Love. With. Each. Cat. I mean but who doesn't? The playroom is adorably chic and clean. Love that u can take a beer, smoothie or coffee drink in with u while u socialize with the cats! Will be coming back very soon for more fun.
We had such a wonderful time here. Sipping our drinks and playing with such wonderful kitties :) Watson was the favorite!
Wonderful staff, coffee, beer, wine and cats and kittens all clean and humans masked up sooo much fun.
So clean and customer service was outstanding!! I went in skeptical and left blown away!!! I will most definitely go back!!!!
So adorable. Very clean. Kind owners. Good coffee.

Absolutely amazing place! Me and my mom are members and come regularly. This cafe is helping animals get adopted. Staff are super friendly. Decent amount of food and drinks. We've been coming for close to a year now, it's great. Totally recommend coming here. The vibes are awesome with the music. Totally worth your money!! The only downside is that disabled people may not be able to get inside considering you have to go up stairs to get to it.
Kitty
Amazing local cat caf√©! Sweetest kitties ever! The staff is always friendly and the Caf√© is very clean and comfortable. üòª

10 out of 10, this place is amazing! I went for coffee, beer, and cats and I came home with a cat! Love that all the cats here are adoptable! Amazing staff make it such a wonderful experience! They make some great coffee here even if I didn't have a visit with the cats scheduled, there's a great area to hang out in.
Always the best experience and great for the kitties that get adopted.  Staff could not be sweeter and the lavender coffee amazeballs
Awesome place.  Had a Groupon for it but totally would go without one. Great staff and excellent kitties!  Thank you Mac Tabby what a great way to help adopt cats
Beautiful time at cafe coffee was great and relaxing with cats
Really fun place to hang out with 10 or so kitties. The staff was friendly and they made a great London Fog Latte.

Wonderful, wonderful, wonderful! A bit pricey at $12 an hour per person, but is totally worth it. All the cats are super playful and friendly. The staff is helpful and kind. I had an amazing time here. It is the best way to get kitties some attention and love as well as finding them forever homes quickly!
Love the food and cats! The people are ok, I guess haha.
Loved it!!!
Had a wonderful time here with my boo. I'll never forget the beautiful cat Mia trying to steal my muffin. The staff was also very very nice <3 Please support this wonderful place!!!

Very nice place. We went for my girlfriends birthday today and was not disappointed at all. The staff was very nice and the cats, oh so many friendly cats. For two people for an hour was $24 and the coffee was really great. You'll definitely need to stop by and see them!
A fun spot to check out. You can even get a beer

I went to Mac Tabby Cat Cafe during Valentine's Day, and brought my significant other along. Upon first appearance, the entrance to the cafe was a bit shady, but as soon as you go up the steps and into a studio styled room, you'll be greeted by friendly workers. My S.O. and I reserved a spot before we got there, and chose the one hour option to lounge with the rescue cats. It was such a lovely time, and I can't wait to come back. (My favorite cat was Mika, even though she almost took my finger)
Very cool place. I just think drink prices were a little high but paying to hang out with cats lol ..... Who knew it would be so much fun

This place is just awesome! Hoping they keep their prices reasonable because playing with cats and not having to clean their poo is the absolute best. The coffee and drinks menu is also a nice touch. 10/10 recommend but don't wear any nice clothes unless you have a heavy duty lint roller handy!
Cute cats, tasty coffee, and friendly staff! What a cozy little corner of NoDa  <3

Went here with the family last Saturday and had a great time! We got there a couple minutes early and the staff was prompt to take our coffee order and get it to us in the cat lounge. It was busy (I would recommend going on a weekday), but the cats roam and rotate around the room so you do get to pet them all. An hour was a good amount of time- it sure goes by fast!! Excited to visit again soon.

Me and my boyfriend had a great time hanging out and playing with the cats here. We also enjoyed our drinks! It was super clean and all of the cats were super soft and sweet, all with their own personalities. All cats are adoptable which I thought was an amazing way to get them out of the shelter and into a place where they can be happy and have a better chance of adoption.

We were visiting from Florida and this happened to be our second cat cafe we've visited while traveling the US. This place is a MUST. They care about their cats and give superior customer service. Thanks for the experience. It'll be a must when we visit again!

I decided to surprise my 18 and 15 year old daughters, my sister and mom with time with the cats and we all LOVED it! I reserved an hour and we definitely enjoyed the entire time.  I was worried we would get bored and should have gotten the 30 min time but 60 min was perfect!  My mom misses not having any animals and this was a great time for her.  I loved seeing all the different cats.  The coffee shop was perfect and had a great variety of coffee drinks.  I definitely recommend this place.  Plan to arrive 10-15 min ahead of time for parking etc.
Had an amazing time here! I would absolutely recommend this place.
Very nice play area for the cats. The girls had a blast petting the cats.  My chai latte was delicious.  Very nice staff.
This is always a wonderful place to spend time. The cafe side has great drinks and pastries but the real highlight is the cat room, where the sweet kitties will charm you.
Great coffee! Great cats! Great staff! I recommend a visit to this place for the experience.

Cute cat cafe in NoDA. Good for younger kids as long as they're gentle with the older cats (the kittens love to play, though) and people who just like being around animals. The pink drink was good, too!
It's such a cute little shop with sweet cats!

The coffee is top notch, very good!  We had a great time, the staff was unbelievably kind, caring and went the extra mile. They seem to go even further helping with the cat population too. While we were there,  3 cats were going to their furever homes and 2 cats were coming in from area rescues. It was incredibly clean, I saw not even one cat hair, never saw nor smelled a litter box and the cats are healthy. Not all the cats love the attention,  some were skittish,  sometimes you just need to be patient!  Great experience!

**caution to those who want to adopt** There is very poor communication between the cafe and the rescue that they use. The employees, while very helpful and kind, have no idea what cats have applications on them or have already been promised to a family, and it is not listed on their website, nor the website of the rescue.  If you want to avoid having your heart set on a cat that has basically already been adopted, the best action to take is to submit an application, wait for it to be accepted, and then visit the cat cafe. I believe they adopt on Thursday nights so if you go on a Friday there shouldn't be any cats that have already been adopted.  If you just want some warm drinks and kitty time, however, it is a good experience. The cats are sweet and the employees are nice, in addition to it being an overall cute environment. You may want to visit on weekdays before 3pm however, to avoid large groups of people, and the stress of watching schoolchildren manhandle the cats.

I honestly really liked this place, its a great chill environment that is perfect only if you want to come hang out with the cats casually. If you are looking to adopt a cat then I don't recommend in the slightest, they have a very thorough application process that takes a few days of being ignored, an email to ask about your application status, and a response telling you that they apologise but the cat you applied for has been adopted already so they overlook your application. So if you want to adopt a cat here, you have to preapply so you give away all of your information with no guarantee of getting the kitten you want to adopt; there is little to no communication on application statuses and no one at the cat Cafe is aware of which cats have pending applications. So if you want to just drink coffee and pet cats, then this place is 5 stars, if you want to adopt from a place that is aware of their cats situation and are informed on the subject, then go somewhere else to adopt.
Fun place to go and hang out with cats! Super clean!  There were 10+ very social cats at this cafe. They love visitors. Cat yoga on Monday nights is a blast too.
BEST DAY EVER!
Love the store/idea behind this place
An amazing place. Kitties everywhere and coffee?! Heaven.
This was literally the greatest night of my entire life. I have captured a video of a kitten sneezing, and now everything is better forever.
Was so much FUN!!  The cats and kittens were so  sweet and friendly!!  Wish I could adopt a few, but I already have 3!!!  GO!!
This is a great, chill place to go love on some cats. The staff is super nice, and the cafe is charming and welcoming. Highly recommend if you need to relax or have some extra time and love to give.

It's a nice place to have a coffee. Who wouldn't like to have coffee out and hang out with a bunch of cool cats, but if you're looking to adopt maybe go another route. There's too large of groups sent in to interact with the kittens/cats. Or maybe request private time.

My sister and I had a really lovely time hanging out with the cats! The staff is super nice which definitely adds to the warm and inviting atmosphere. I could not expect a more enjoyable experience out of this- there are enough cats to love on for everyone even if many of them are sleeping. They all look very well cared for - and all are adoptable! Great concept and amazing execution. Would highly recommend even if you're not a cat person!
Awesome place to interact with cats that are available for adoption!!
Cats, cats and cats!!
Wonderful cats and a wonderful time!

Absolutely love this place! If you want to have a wonderful time with some great cats, come here! Conveniently located in the center of NoDa. The coffee and sweet treats are delicious and we love enjoying them while we play with the cats. They also do such great things for these cats and now have over 240 adoptions! It's a fantastic way to get to know a cat before taking them home.
I visited MacTabby on Wednesday and had a great time with the cats and staff. Beautiful playroom setup, and the staff is so friendly. I'll be returning whenever I'm in Charlotte.
Fun place, good coffee sweet kitties!
Fantastic coffee, super friendly staff, and of course, a bunch of super chill and adorable cats! Get here by any means necessary and enjoy!
It's such a peaceful comfort being around loving fur babies‚ù§üê±

Me and my girlfriend found this place randomly while trying to find something to do and I'm glad we did. This is such a simple idea, have some Coffee and play with some cats, but it is executed so perfectly and after an hour flew by I can see why people come here. The staff was awesome and friendly, the cats were a treat to be around, the coffee was great. We also had the pleasure of speaking with the owner for a little bit during our visit and her positivity and passion for what she is doing made the experience even better. Furthermore the service this business is providing finding good homes for these cats is just another reason anyone in the area looking for something to do should stop by and enjoy the experience and contribute to this business's success. Thanks for the good time and we will be back next time we are in town.
If you're looking to adopt a super sweet kitty or just spend a little time (and a little money) it's a great place to hang out a bit.

Overall I highly recommend Mac Tabby Cafe as a great place to relax and have fun. I brought my girlfriend on a date there and we had a blast. The drinks we had before tasted great and were reasonably priced. The employees were what really made Mac Tabby special. They were kind and seemed excited to be there. They told us about the cats names and fun facts about them. I'm not even a cat person but I really liked the environment and mood of the place. I love seeing when animals are taken care of properly and are happy. It was a great experience that I would 100% recommend to anyone.

Fun! We didn't have reservations, which are highly recommended on weekends but they were able to accommodate us with no issues and we loved our experience! The cats were so fun and all had their own little personalities on display. 30 minutes seemed enough time. I loved that the staff stayed present to ensure the safety and comfort of the animals and they had their own kitty escape door where they could wander off to if they decided they were done being social (the cats, not the staff, lol). Fun place and great concept! Very therapeutic environment getting to love on these gentle creatures!

The coffee is actually some of the better I've had in Charlotte, and I ended up adopting one of the cats. Quality spot! I recommend it, if you're thinking of adopting, or just want to cool it with some kitties.

Such a fantastic place!  Spending an hour with all the kitties was so much fun!  So many different cats, all ages, unique personalities....a really special outing.  They also have a great selection of refreshments.  We had the Spiced Apple Cider, Pumpkin Pie Tea, and Chai Latte. All delicious!!
So much fun! The cats are adorable.
What a fun place to just chill and unwind with some kitty cats!
An extremely nice owner with tons of sweet, fun kitties to play with. I cant wait to go back once I'm in NC again!
It was a very nice chill place.  The cats roam around and you can sit on the floor and play with them.

Coffee and cats, what better way to spend my birthday?!  But seriously, very clean and well managed. It's obvious the owner is very passionate about giving these kitties a good home until they can be adopted out to a forever homes.
Sorry you are not aloud to pick up the cats
Amazing place to relax and play with cats. Wasn't aware of the $12/hr fee or $8/30mins. Overall nicely kempt place
Really loved having coffee and cats

Perfect cozy cafe with a wonderful ambiance and great coffee! If you can go soon, grab their Maple Pancake Latte; you won't be disappointed! We love that supporting this cafe helps to get so many cats adopted! The staff is always so friendly and both the cafe and cat play area are very clean. Each time we have brought our toddler, we come away with big smiles and nice memories. Such a special spot in Charlotte! Thank you for all you do, Mac Tabby!

If you have a girlfriend (or just yourself) that loves cats, well... Instant thoughtful date opportunity at this place! It's exactly what it says: drink something and play with cats. Very comfy atmosphere, and the cats are 11/10
It was a very cute cafe. They had 12 cats to interact with in the cat room. It was about $8 for a half hour in the room and $12 for an hour.

Go for the cats.  Mac Tabby has a nice open seating area that allows for the cats to roam and have plenty of places to hang out.   Remember that even though you're going for the cats, it's on their terms, so don't expect to be swarmed with cats looking for pets.  Each has their own personality and since they are all adoptable, it means the next time you go in there may be new cats!
Love this place! Great Loca mocha lattes music and conversation. Play with cats and kittens which is kind of therapeutic very tranquil. There should be more places like this in the world!
Such a cute place!  The kitties were so fun, and my daughter and her friends were in heaven!  If we could've adopted one, this is the place to do it!

Great place in NoDa to drink coffee, get work done, take a brain break to hang with some kitties, drink some wine or beer, and even do cat yoga on Monday nights! Reasonable prices and tons of cats and kittens to play with.
I'm a cat guy that can't have a cat right now so it's a great place to have a beer and chill with some kitty's!
Really great place. Friendly staff, giving cats a great life while awaiting rescue. Prices reasonable and largely going to care of the animals. Great coffee and good selection of local beer.
